overview:
Old school values with new school tech knowledge. Not just your run of he mill business person but someone who values the relationships that make business successful.

Looking to work for companies that need or want someone who ca make their product a success without all the usual bs that goes with selling.

Being Scottish makes me able to instantly build a good rapport, everyone loves and trusts the Scots as hard working,honest, committed and enthusiastic. We have created many of the worlds greatest inventions and to have a Scotsman in your team is a guarantee of success.
